thread.title: Tamannaah Bhatia, Shriya Saran, Hansika, Nagma: 7 actresses who were manhandled in public
thread.title_full: Tamannaah Bhatia, Shriya Saran, Hansika, Nagma: 7 actresses who were manhandled in public

author: karthika raveendran
title: Tamannaah Bhatia, Shriya Saran, Hansika, Nagma: 7 actresses who were manhandled in public
text:
Akshay Kumar’s puppy love! 
On Saturday morning, the Malayalam industry woke up to a shocking news – A leading Malayalam actress had been abducted and molested in her own car. The plan had been hatched by her driver – Martin and six other people. They reportedly drove around for two hours, wherein, they physically assaulted her and clicked pictures of the actress before dropping her off. The industry is aghast at this horrific incident. Right from Prithviraj to Mohanlal to Dulquer to Dileep to Manju Warrier to Innocent – everyone came out in support to protest this act. Unfortunately, this is not a celebrity’s first brush with such disturbing incidents. Many actresses across industries have experienced unpleasant moments when in public. 
Nagma: While contesting a public rally, the veteran actress was man handled and felt up by a local MLA – Gajraj Sharma 
Tamannaah Bhatia: She was harassed by some Seemandhra supporters at the airport, who stopped her and insisted she say, “Jai Samaikhyandhra.” 
Shriya Saran: In 2008 when she was stepping out of the famous Tirupathi temple, a fan allegedly molested her. She slapped the miscreant and later, he was pinned down by her men. 
Nayanthara: The unfortunate situation took place at a school function in Chennai. When fans spotted their favourite actress, they rushed to her. Unfortunately, some even tried to grope her, despite cops being around. 
Hansika Motwani – The actress was mobbed in Coimbatore when a large number of fans turned up to catch a glimpse of the actress at an event. The excited fans got carried away and got too close to her, some of them forcefully touched her body. 
Jyothika – This actress was harassed by a fan in public, in fact, there is video footage of the shocking incident that went viral. 
Genelia: At an event in Hyderabad, she was harassed by one of her fans despite being surrounded by bouncers and policemen. She slapped that particular fan. 
Talking about the current molestation case, police are investigation into the case. Reports state, this may have been the work of rivals, who want to ruin her career. Certain reports state, the motive was to ruin he actress’ career. At the moment, the hunt is on to nab all the criminals involved in this horrific case. 
Published: February 21, 2017 11:17 am Topics:
